message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $95. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the item, but I can only pay up to $85 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my original price. Would you consider $90?
Thanks for adjusting your offer, Alice. I can't go above $87 for the item. Let me know if we can reach an agreement.
